page.title: 07Carnival.
page.content: In{1984}the{Carnival Committee}was reformed after 20 years.They decided to have a{carnival in 1985.}At a dance in the village hall the{carnival {queen,}Lyn Sutton and her two attendants Sandra Currington and Mandy Sutton were chosen. The{carnival was held on Saturday {6th.July 1985.}The first float carried the Carnival Queen with her two attendants. She was followed by a lot of other floats. At the head of the procession was the{Warslow band.}The entertainments on the carnival field included fancy dress competition, clothing stall,toy stall,tombola stall and lots more. The{school children performed some {country dances.}It was a successful day which ended with a dance at the village hall.
